communities.no communities text: Looks like you don't follow any communities yet. Don't worry, you can browse them and start following them below.

config check.outbox relays missing explanation: These relays should be configured for reliable operations: {{relays}}.
config check.media server missing explanation: The Pareto media server should be used to make sure images are reliably stored: {{servers}}.
config check.unreliable media servers explanation: These media servers are known to be not reliable: {{servers}}.
config check.profile missing explanation: A Nostr profile should be present to let readers know about you.
config check.profile name missing explanation: There is no name set in the profile.
config check.profile display name missing explanation: There is no display name set in the profile.
config check.profile about text missing explanation: There is no about text set in the profile.
config check.profile nip-05 missing explanation: There is no NIP-05 handle set in the profile.
config check.profile nip-05 missing solution: You can try to use the suggested {{nip05}} handle.
config check.profile nip-05 name missing explanation: The name of the NIP-05 handle is missing on the server.
config check.profile nip-05 name missing solution: You can try to use the suggested {{nip05}} handle.
config check.profile nip-05 not matching pubkey expla: The NIP-05 handle in the profile does not match the pubkey on the server.
config check.profile nip-05 not matching pubkey solut: You can try to use the suggested {{nip05}} handle.
config check.profile nip-05 network error explanation: The NIP-05 handle in the profile is not reachable. ({{error}})
config check.profile nip-05 network error solution: You can try to use the suggested {{nip05}} handle.
config check.profile nip-05 invalid explanation: The NIP-05 handle in the profile is invalid.
config check.profile avatar missing explanation: There is no profile picture set.
config check.profile avatar not url text: Profile avatar picture not a URL
config check.profile avatar not url explanation: The profile avatar picture is not a valid URL.
config check.profile banner missing explanation: There is no profile banner set.
config check.profile banner not url text: Profile banner picture not a URL
config check.profile banner not url explanation: The profile banner picture is not a valid URL.
config check.profile lud-06 configured explanation: The LUD-06 field should be empty so that the wallet address in the LUD-16 field is used.
config check.profile lud-06 format error explanation: The LUD-06 field is not a valid Bech32 encoded string. ({{error}})
config check.profile lud-16 missing explanation: No Lightning wallet address is set in the profile (LUD-16).
config check.profile lud-16 missing solution: You can obtain a valid address using the Wallet of Satoshi mobile app (Android, iOS). It looks like an email address: <wallet name>@walletofsatoshi.com.
config check.profile lud-16 whitespace explanation: The LUD-16 field in the profile is surrounded by spaces which can prevent it from working.
config check.profile lud-16 bitcoin address text: Profile LUD-16 field contains a Bitcoin address
config check.profile lud-16 bitcoin address explanati: You have specified in the LUD-16 field a Bitcoin address but it needs to be a Lightning wallet address.
config check.profile lud-16 bitcoin address solution: You can obtain a valid address using the Wallet of Satoshi mobile app (Android, iOS). It looks like an email address: <wallet name>@walletofsatoshi.com.
config check.profile lud-16 invalid explanation: The Lightning wallet configured in the LUD-16 field in the profile is invalid.
config check.profile lud-16 invalid solution: You can obtain a valid address using the Wallet of Satoshi mobile app (Android, iOS). It looks like an email address: <wallet name>@walletofsatoshi.com.
config check.profile lud-16 offline explanation: The Lightning wallet configured in the LUD-16 field in the profile appears to be offline. ({{error}})
config check.profile lud-16 callback offline explanat: The Lightning wallet configured in the LUD-16 field in the profile appears to be offline. ({{error}})
config check.profile lud-16 invalid response explanat: The Lightning wallet configured in the LUD-16 field in the profile doesn't work as expected. (Error: {{error}})
config check.profile lud-16 not nostr enabled explana: The Lightning wallet configured in the LUD-16 field doesn't associate payments with your Nostr profile.
config check.profile avatar error explanation: The profile avatar picture can't be loaded.
config check.profile banner error explanation: The profile banner picture can't be loaded.

email import dialog.import selection explanation: You can either upload a CSV file or add a list of comma-separated email addresses.
email import dialog.import subscribers warning: Add only those individuals who have explicitly agreed to receive emails. (double opt-in method)
email import dialog.import only opt-in explanation: Do not include individuals whose information was collected solely through product/service exchanges, giveaways, or similar methods.
email import dialog.email not mapped error message: At least the email field must be mapped

email subscription dialog.info text: Get new articles of {{profileName}} delivered to your inbox.
email subscription dialog.privacy info: The email is stored by the author, not the Pareto project
email subscription dialog.sent message text: Sent opt-in, you will get a confirmation email shortly.
email subscription dialog.error message text: Error subscribing to list: {{error}}. Please contact us at support@pareto.space

internals.explanation: This page shows diagnostic information about the application.
internals.error reporting: When reporting an error, please include the information below.

media page.logged in read only message: Media files can't be loaded when logged-in read only
media page.not logged in message: Media files can't be loaded when not logged-in

media selector.no server configured message: You seem to have no media servers configured. Do you want to use the Pareto media server?

publish article dialog.relays description: Select the relays you want to publish to
publish article dialog.no relays configured text: Do you want to configure some default relays?
publish article dialog.send also via email singular checkbox te: Publish article and send via email to one recipient
publish article dialog.send also via email plural checkbox text: Publish article and send via email to {{recipientCount}} recipients

search.explanation 1: Add a Nostr ID (npub, nprofile, nevent or naddr), Nostr address (tony@pareto.space) or a URL with a Nostr ID
search.explanation 2: Hashtags are supported, set a # before a word to filter by hashtags.

search bar.placeholder: URL, Nostr ID, or Nostr Address

settings.outbox relays description: This relay type stores all your content.
settings.outbox relays test mode information: Outbox relays can't be configured in test mode
settings.inbox relays description: This relay type receives all replies, comments, likes, and zaps to your posts.
settings.relay read only login info: In read-only mode you can't modify relay settings.
settings.no relays configured text: You seem to have no relays configured. Do you want to a add some?
settings.no media server configured text: You seem to have no media server configured. Do you want to a add one?
settings.nip-96 servers description: This media server type uses the NIP-96 protocol.
settings.media server read only login info: In read-only mode you can't modify server settings.
settings.blossom servers description: This media server type uses the Blossom protocol.
settings.profile editor not implemented text: The profile editor is not yet implemented. Please use one of the existing alternatives.
settings.no profile read only informational text: You seem to have no profile but can't create one in read-only mode
settings.no profile informational text: You seem to have no profile - do you want to create one?
settings.profile name field description: This is a short name you use to identify yourself on Nostr.
settings.profile display_name field description: This is a longer name you use to identify yourself on Nostr.
settings.profile nip05 field description: This is the handle you use to identify yourself on Nostr. It is used to verify your identity. If you are an author of the Pareto project you automatically have one you can use here.
settings.profile about field placeholder: Enter a short description about yourself
settings.profile about field description: This is a short description about yourself.
settings.profile picture field placeholder: Enter a URL of a picture
settings.profile picture field description: This is the small picture displayed with your name at different places.
settings.profile banner field placeholder: Enter a URL of a banner
settings.profile banner field description: This is the banner displayed at the top of your profile page.
settings.profile lud06 field description: This is the LUD-06 field. It is used to store the LNURL of a Lightning wallet. You only need to fill either this or the LUD-16 field, however prefer the LUD-16 field.
settings.profile lud16 field description: This is the LUD-16 field. It is used to store the Lightning wallet address for payments. You can obtain a valid address using the Wallet of Satoshi mobile app (Android, iOS). It looks like an email address: <wallet name>@walletofsatoshi.com.

sign-in.sign-in request: Please sign up/in to access the page
